original_text: These are the testimonies, and the statutes, and the judgments, which Moses spake unto the children of Israel, after they came forth out of Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽에서 나온 후에 모세가 증언과 규례와 법도를 선포하였으니

sentences.original_text: which Moses spake unto the children of Israel
after they came forth out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 애굽에서 나온 후에 말한 것이니라
